items.title: Junior Software Engineer — Talenom Oy
bullets: Talenom is a Finnish Fintech company that provides accounting and financial management solutions
Built customer portal for 10,000+ clients (React, Node.js).
Developed KYC tool improving onboarding efficiency by 30%.
Thesis on DIY accounting automation adopted internally.

items.title: Junior Data Scientist — Cyreen
bullets: Cyreen is a German startup that provides digital marketing solutions
Built Python crawlers for 100+ supermarket sites, boosting insights by 25%.
Created KPI queries and integrated weather/sports data.
Worked with PowerBI, Tableau, Azure, SQL, Excel, PowerPoint and Python

items.title: Student Assistant — HAMK University
bullets: Tutored in Java OOP, Servlets, AJAX
Planned and led workshops for students.

items.title: Volunteer Group Lead — Slush Helsinki
bullets: Volunteer in Construction team of Slush Helsinki

items.title: Developer at Junction Hackathon
bullets: Junction 2025 is the biggest AI hackathon in Europe with +1500 engineers

items.title: Volunteer Group Lead — Slush Helsinki
bullets: Slush is the largest gathering of startups and investors in the world
